itunes:title: #45: Understanding and Honoring Your Trauma Response
title: #45: Understanding and Honoring Your Trauma Response
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Everyone deals with stress and trauma a little differently... and that's okay. Take a listen to this podcast episode to learn more about your response and finding balance.      MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODESave your spot for our weekly...
itunes:summary:
Everyone deals with stress and trauma a little differently... and that's okay.

Take a listen to this podcast episode to learn more about your response and finding balance.
